put.desc: Creates a Stream Analytics Private Endpoint or replaces an already existing Private Endpoint.

params.name: privateEndpoint
params.desc: The definition of the private endpoint that will be used to create a new cluster or replace the existing one.

200.desc: The private endpoint was successfully created or replaced.

201.desc: The private endpoint was successfully created or replaced.

get.desc: Lists the private endpoints in the cluster.

200.desc: Successfully listed the private endpoints under the specified cluster.
